author: cnbc.com
title: David Harper Joins Alliant Healthcare Group
text:
Longtime healthcare specialist to service diverse Western Region client base
NEWPORT BEACH, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Longtime healthcare insurance specialist David Harper has joined Alliant. As Senior Vice President within the company’s Healthcare Group, the Orange County, CA-based Harper will design and deploy customized insurance and risk management solutions to a diverse portfolio of healthcare clients throughout the Western Region.
“As the healthcare market continues to change and evolve, we are dedicated to providing this critical group of clients with innovative and powerful solutions to meet their changing needs,” said Todd Hagemeier, Executive Vice President and Managing Director, Healthcare Group. “David’s unique expertise and tremendous foresight will play a critical role in expanding capabilities within the healthcare market.”
Harper joins Alliant with a deep institutional knowledge of the healthcare industry and a strong command of the regional marketplace. He has earned high regard among his clients for his ability to adapt quickly to changing market dynamics and provide high-value strategic risk solutions for a breadth of industry segments.
Prior to joining Alliant, Harper was Regional Director with a large national insurance and risk management brokerage firm. He also has experience as Founder and President of his own insurance brokerage firm.
Harper is based in the Newport Beach, CA office of Alliant and can be reached at (949) 527-9878 or at David.Harper@alliant.com .
About Alliant Insurance Services
Headquartered in Newport Beach, CA, Alliant Insurance Services, Inc. provides property and casualty, workers’ compensation, employee benefits, surety, and financial products and services to clients nationwide, including public entities, tribal nations, healthcare, energy, law firms, real estate, construction, and other industry groups. More information is available on the company’s website at www.alliant.com .
